prompt: Design a modern budget planner page with a dark theme, featuring a sleek black background (#121212) and neon accents (cyan #00BCD4, pink #E91E63). The header should display 'Budget Planner' in bold white text (24px, Roboto, FontWeight.w700) with a cyan underline, aligned to the left. Show the total balance in large cyan text (32px, bold) below the title. Include a monthly overview with the current month and year (18px, white) and neon pink navigation arrows (22px). Present expense categories in a vertical list, each in a dark gray card (#1E1E1E) with neon borders (cyan for under budget, pink for near limit, red for over). Each category should include a title, a linear progress indicator (2px height), spent amount, total budget, and remaining amount (12px, white). Use neon-colored icons for categories. The recent transactions section should be a scrollable list with dark cards, showing merchant name (14px, white), category icon, amount (cyan for income, pink for expense), and date (12px, gray). Place two centered floating action buttons at the bottom: one for expenses (cyan, minus icon) and one for income (pink, plus icon). Use 20px padding, 10px spacing, and smooth transitions for interactions.
